# üêç 1000 Python Program Ideas

A comprehensive list of 1000 unique Python programming projects organized by difficulty.

---

## üìä Quick Navigation

- [Super Easy (1-100)](#super-easy-1-100) - 5-15 minutes each
- [Easy (101-300)](#easy-101-300) - 15-30 minutes each
- [Medium (301-600)](#medium-301-600) - 30 min - 2 hours each
- [Hard (601-850)](#hard-601-850) - 2-5 hours each
- [Very Hard (851-1000)](#very-hard-851-1000) - 5+ hours each

## üìä Statistics

| Category | Count | Percentage |
|----------|-------|------------|
| Super Easy | 100 | 10% |
| Easy | 200 | 20% |
| Medium | 300 | 30% |
| Hard | 250 | 25% |
| Very Hard | 150 | 15% |
| **Total** | **1000** | **100%** |

## üéØ How to Use This List

### For Beginners
Start with Super Easy (1-100), then progress to Easy (101-300)

### For Intermediate
Start with Medium (301-600), review Easy if needed

### For Advanced
Tackle Hard (601-850) and Very Hard (851-1000)

### For Interview Prep
Focus on:
- Algorithms (601-650)
- Data Structures (651-700)
- System Design (751-800)

### For Portfolio
Build projects from:
- Complete Applications (961-1000)
- Production Systems (921-960)
- Machine Learning (801-850)
